title: 450 Officers & 3,361 other ranks of the Sri Lanka Air Force promoted on Victory Day
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); To be in parallel with the ‘Victory Day’ (May 18) Commander of the Sri Lanka Air Force Air Marshal Sudarshana Pathirana promoted 450 Officers and 3,361 other ranks of the Sri Lanka Air Force, who are eligible for their next rank with effect from today (18).
450 Officers & 3,361 other ranks of the Sri Lanka Air Force promoted on Victory Day
